body:
---

## What happened

java.lang.IllegalStateException: Do not change documents during undo as it will break undo sequence.

## Version information

Android Studio `Arctic Fox | 2020.3.1 Patch 3` • Flutter plugin `io.flutter 61.2.2` • Dart plugin `203.8452`

Flutter 2.5.3 • channel stable • https://github.com/flutter/flutter.git
Framework • revision 18116933e7 (2 weeks ago) • 2021-10-15 10:46:35 -0700
Engine • revision d3ea636dc5
Tools • Dart 2.14.4

## Exception

null

comment_data.body:
It looks like the user requested an undo, which after prompting caused a file to be saved. That triggered a format-on-save action, which could not be run in the middle of an undo.

This will probably be fixed when #4625 is done.

rename.from: java.lang.IllegalStateException: Do not change documents during undo as it will break undo sequence.
rename.to: Undo triggered format-on-save, which cannot run during undo

milestone.description: Work triaged but not yet planned for a specific release.
milestone.title: Backlog

title: Undo triggered format-on-save, which cannot run during undo
